title: Manston Airfield: Proposed extension for its use for Operation Stack

details.body:
On 4 August 2015 the Department for Transport announced that an agreement had been reached with the owners of Manston Airfield in East Kent to queue lorries bound for the Port of Dover on a temporary basis in the event that Operation Stack was activated.

Highways England launched their consultation on the long term solutions to Operation Stack on 11 December 2015 and it closed on 26 January 2016. Highways England are in the process of submitting reports on the consultation to Government.

However, before doing so the Government wishes to hear from local and wider communities, businesses and organisations about the use of Manston, and has asked Highways England to carry out this consultation.

description: Proposals for extension to use Manston Airfield in the event that Operation Stack is activated.
